oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard of Pvts. Walter Golden, Bennie Golden and two unidentified soldiers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The photo shows a man sitting on a chair with three others standing behind him. The seated man is wearing an overseas cap with his helmet on his knee. The others are wearing helmets. Each is holding either a cigarette or a pipe. The photo was taken somewhere in France. Walter (seated) and Bennie (standing at left) Golden served in Co. B, 119th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. Walter Golden later was gassed. The brothers were from Rickman, Overton County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Golden, Walter; Golden, Bennie
